languages.text: [draft]The Psyker can {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} away or pull closer all enemies in a semi-circle with a 3-cell radius. The targets are moved by {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} cells directly away from the Psyker or directly toward the Psyker, and must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>2×(Psyker's WP {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: [draft]The Psyker can push away or pull closer all enemies in a semi-circle with a 3-cell radius. The targets are moved by <u>psy rating</u> cells directly away from the Psyker or directly toward the Psyker, and must pass a Toughness test with a −<u>2×(Psyker's WP Bonus)</u> penalty or become prone for 1 round.
